item.title: About
item.description:
Joining the group

There aren’t any requirements or sign-up procedures for joining the group, you should just be willing to present one of the topics that are yet to come up (see the schedule). We highly recommend dropping by the either the IRC (##qft on irc.libera.chat) or matrix chat room (they’re bridged) before joining one of the seminars so you can get up to speed with the current state of the group.
